attributes.action: Blue for Salt and Vinegar, Green for Cheese and Onion
attributes.additional_details:
The government should force Walkers to change their packaging for Salt and Vinegar flavour and Cheese and Onion flavour crisps to bring them back in line with the standard blue for Salt and Vinegar and Green for Cheese and Onion.
This would cause much less confusion when browsing the snack isle in the supermarket.
